lines.text: Fix yourself a drink, there. I better get out of these pajamas.
Call me if you need any help. After all, we're in this thing together.
It's such a stupid story, it must be true.
What's your stupid story?
I don't tell this to everyone; but, my mother was Mata Hari and my father was Sherlock Holmes.
Oh, when you look at me like that, I'm almost tempted to give it to you.
Oh, that's wonderful... No, wait a minute, wait - wait, wait, wait. I said I'd do a job. I better get it over with first.
You, English - are such boy scouts!
You talk too much. Kiss me, instead.
Well, it may sound rather British; but, I usually - arrange my own seductions.
You're the doctor.
Thank heavens.
For what?
You're not a patient.
Your code book? I take it you are no longer using "The Oxford Book of Verse".
No, we've changed that.
What is the new one?
The "Kama Sutra".
The "Kama Sutra"?
Oh, but it's the English language edition.
This book is banned in our country.
That's precisely why the chose it.
Good lord, I was almost a virgin surgeon in those days.
Well, so long as its clearly understood that I'm not a cross between Superman and a spy in black.
Yes, well I do hope you're not; because, that kind of exhibitionism always ends in tragedy.
What is done between people in our, eh, line of business?
Not a great deal of sleeping together. Its regarded as - unprofessional.
Now, if one of the professionals is an amateur?
When you look at me like that, I'd tell you everything. I'd give you my spy kit, my password, identity papers, travelers checks, everything.
So, I must not tempt you.
Oh, please do. See how good I'd be under torture.
What do we do now?
We do the professional thing. We have a drink.
You mean, we just - walk out the door?
Well, I'm not climbing out the bloody window.
Alright, out you come, Bill, Tom. Come on, fellas, at the double... We got to evacuate all the Eskimos.
Don't do that! Don't do that! Stop making me do it again! Don't do that!
I'm not a Russian.
A Limey! What do you know!
We English are conservative and resist progress.
